chapters.title: Chapter 16: In the White Tower
chapters.info: Tesan, p. 250—Sitter for the White Ajah in Tar Valon. She is an arithmetist, and grew up in Tarabon. She wears her dark hair in beaded braids. Her face always looks worried, and looks as though it has been pinched at the top and stretched. She grew up in Tarabon.
